item.title: My first script autologin
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

hmm if you have srl
This is the script

{---------------->}
program autologin;
{<----------------}
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
username ='y3ll0 sn0';  //add your username
password ='peepee';  //add your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemouse(468, 291)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(username)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(373, 274)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(password)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(331, 320)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(1000);
Writeln('now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!')
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
writeln('Logging in')
login;
end.

if you dont have srl
then heres the other script

{---------------->}
program autologin;
{<----------------}

const
username ='y3ll0 sn0';  //add your username
password ='peepee';  //add your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemouse(468, 291)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeys(username)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(373, 274)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeys(password)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(331, 320)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(1000);
Writeln('now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!')
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
writeln('Logging in')
login;
end.

A few more things that you didnt really do right
The comments after the pass and user and them arrows at the top must have a
“{” to keep typin notes or comments without them errors, put a “}” to stop typing notes or comments

or you can do this"//" to type stuff on one line

To download srl go here:
villu-reborn.com

Move mouse smooth is to dectable so i put move mouse

them wait times are to quick try putting them in seconds a.k.a 1000-infinity

Sometimes you put a until(false) before the end. but for this it has terminatescript;
Which stops the script where ever you put it!

At the end

ActivateClient;= activates the window that you put the crosshair on
Cleardebug;= clears debug box
setupSRL;= (only if you have srl) Sets Up SRL

Glad i can help

Read full topic

item.title: My first script autologin
item.dc:creator: @stupidgorge stupidgorge
item.description:
@stupidgorge wrote:

hi please tell me how i can improve my script.[scar]---------------->
program autologin;
<----------------
const
username =’’;add ure username
password =’’;add ure password

begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(500);
Sendkeys(username)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(500);
SendKeys(password)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end.
[/scar]
